title: Drawing, "Theater Set for Checkmate", 1947
medium: Brush and gouache on cream paper
signed: Signed in light blue gouache, lower right: E. McKnight Kauffer '47
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper center: TOP
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Set design showing two hands and arms, one gray, one white, across the sky, black dots on the hands and arms are connected by black and yellow lines that connect to a gray rhomboid at the lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Theater Set for Checkmate", 1947.
1947. Brush and gouache on cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-271.
